articles.title: Thousands evacuated as wildfires sweep across western Europe - The Guardian
articles.description: People ordered to leave homes in France and on Costa del Sol while Portugal says heatwave has killed 238 so far
articles.content:
Huge wildfires swept across western Europe on Saturday, destroying swathes of land and forcing thousands from their homes amid a record-breaking heatwave that shows no signs of easing.
